name: amnezia
description: Amnezia VPN allows users to create their own private VPN server with a simple interface. It uses Docker containers for modular configuration and supports custom protocols to evade censorship and improve privacy.
features: Private VPN Server: Create your own VPN server with simple setup. Full control over your connection.
Censorship Evasion: Custom protocols designed to bypass internet restrictions. Access the open internet.
Docker-Based: Modular configuration using containers for flexibility. Easy deployment and management.
Multi-Platform: Clients for Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android. Protect all your devices.
Enhanced Privacy: Your own server means no third-party VPN provider. True privacy guaranteed.
Simple Interface: User-friendly setup wizard for non-technical users. VPN in minutes.
Protocol Variety: Multiple VPN protocols including custom obfuscation options. Adapt to any situation.
Cost-Effective: Use any VPS provider to run your personal VPN. Affordable privacy solution.
